title: Mathematics Argumentation Skill Enhancement Program Using CSCL-Based Expressive Scaffolding

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Mathematical Concepts (Middle School Level)
context.additional_context: Education focusing on collaborative learning and argument structuring in mobile environments using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners will be able to construct mathematical arguments with logical reasoning using argumentation diagram tools in a CSCL environment.
Learners will be able to improve the quality of argumentative texts by incorporating peer feedback during collaborative learning.
Learners will be able to generate argument structures 20% higher in quality using graphic tools than text-based tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
